resources.name: Mission United - National Capital Area
resources.description: Mission United connects veterans, active-duty service members, National Guard, Reservists, and their families to local resources. Services include career coaching, employment support, financial stability programs, housing assistance, and benefits navigation. Veterans work with a dedicated navigator to identify goals and access community resources.
resources.eligibility: Veterans, active-duty service members, National Guard, Reservists, and their families in the DC/MD/VA region.
resources.how_to_apply: Call 703-246-8800 or visit the website to connect with a Mission United navigator.

resources.name: United Way NCA - Financial Stability Program
resources.description: VITA (Volunteer Income Tax Assistance) free tax preparation, financial coaching, and emergency financial assistance for qualifying families including veteran households.
resources.eligibility: Low to moderate income individuals and families, including veterans.
